artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 236, horizontal chūban #24.24
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 大井川渡りいそげば宿の名の妹がしまだの目にはとまらず　森泉亭広規 {Ōigawa watari isogeba yado no mei no imōto ga Shimada no me ni wa tomarazu, ...} (Palanquin bearers are so busy crossing the Ōi River that they don\'t even pay attention to famous girls working at the inns in Shimada, ...)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi 東海道五十三次), also known as the Kyōka Tōkaidō
title: Shimada
